description_zh: 吾爱破解论坛深耕软件逆向工程与反病毒技术领域，汇聚众多技术爱好者的智慧与经验，共同探索与分享前沿安全技术和防护策略，构建业内最具影响力的技术交流平台。
description_en: 52pojie.cn has been deeply involved in the fields of software reverse engineering and anti-virus technology. It brings together the wisdom and experience of numerous technology enthusiasts, who jointly explore and share cutting-edge security technologies and protection strategies, and build the most influential technology exchange platform in the industry.
submitRequirements_zh: 必须加上软件正常运行截图、软件介绍和使用说明。不能添加网站。不能添加个人联系方式。
submitRequirements_en: Screenshots of the software running normally, software introduction, and usage instructions must be added. Do not add websites. Do not add personal contact information.
rating_zh: 可以在【原创发布区】发布自己的产品进行曝光。
rating_en: You can publish your own products in the 【Original Publishing Area】 for exposure.
